items.title: Can US Measles Outbreaks Be Stopped?
items.description: The US almost lost its measles elimination status once. Lessons from that episode suggest it will be more difficult to avoid doing so now.

items.title: Watch Our Livestream Replay: Inside the AI Copyright Battles
items.description: Curious about generative AI and copyright? On July 16, our writers answered your questions about this critical topic.

items.title: ElliQ Review: An AI Companion Bot for Lonely Elders
items.description: The AI-powered ElliQ robot and smart display aim to improve life for older folks living alone.

items.title: DHS Faces New Pressure Over DNA Taken From Immigrant Children
